Test Name: CYB5 and CYB5 Reductase Genetic Analysis (NGS)
Purpose: To detect and characterize variants in CYB5 and CYB5 Reductase genes for diagnosing recessive congenital methemoglobinemia.
Equipment: NGS sequencer (e.g., Illumina MiSeq), DNA extraction kit, library preparation kit, thermal cycler, bioinformatics software
